text: Giancarlo Carloni (born June 8, 1947 in Civita Castellana) is a retired Italian professional football player. His professional debut in the 1966/67 season for A.S. Roma remained his only Serie A game in his career. ==External links== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. title: Giancarlo Carloni
